My Games

Super Mario 3D World

A 3D platformer that introduces new power-ups and cooperative gameplay for up to four players.

Year: 2013

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Wii U

The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker HD

An HD remaster of the classic Zelda game, featuring updated graphics and gameplay improvements.

Year: 2013

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Wii U

LEGO Marvel Super Heroes

An action-adventure game featuring LEGO versions of Marvel superheroes in a new story.

Year: 2013

Publisher: Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment

Console: Wii U

New Super Luigi U

A standalone expansion featuring Luigi in new, challenging levels.

Year: 2013

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Wii U

Rabbids Land

A party game featuring the Rabbids in a board game-style adventure with mini-games.

Year: 2013

Publisher: Ubisoft

Console: Wii U

Skylanders: Trap Team

A toys-to-life game that introduces new trapping mechanics for capturing villains.

Year: 2014

Publisher: Activision

Console: Wii U
